Se conducían a gran velocidad por Avenida Belgrano, cruzaron un semáforo en rojo y los chocaron
Ocurrió este viernes por la noche en Avenida Belgrano y Pueyrredón. Los sujetos, que se conducían en una moto de alta cilindrada, fueron trasladados en gravísimo estado al hospital Regional.
01 Nov 2019 by Policiales
Un violento accidente se registró en la noche de este viernes, en el que tuvo que intervenir personal de la Comisaría Sexta y Criminalística.
Según los primeros datos que surgen tras el siniestro vial, dos sujetos habrían estado escapando de la policía tras cometer un hecho ilícito, en una motocicleta Rouser de alta cilindrada.
Durante su escape, habrían cruzado en rojo el semáforo de Avenida Belgrano y calle Pueyrredón de esta ciudad capital, provocando un violento accidente.
Producto de la gran velocidad a la que habrían estado circulando, los dos ocupantes de la motocicleta salieron despedidos luego de ser impactados por una camioneta Renault Kangoo.

En un primer momento se dio a conocer que uno de ellos había perdido la vida en el lugar, pero luego se confirmó que fueron trasladados al hospital Regional en gravísimo estado con fracturas múltiples, contusiones y escoriaciones varias.




En el lugar, trabajó personal de la Comisaría Sexta y Criminalística.
text:
They were driving at high speed on Belgrano Avenue, they crossed a red light and hit them
It happened this Friday night at Avenida Belgrano and Pueyrredón. The subjects, who were driving on a high displacement motorcycle, were transported in very serious condition to the Regional hospital.
01 Nov 2019 by Policiales
A violent accident was recorded on Friday night, in which personnel from the Sixth and Criminalistics Police Station had to intervene.
According to the first data that arise after the road accident, two subjects would have been escaping from the police after committing an illegal act, on a high-capacity Rouser motorcycle.
During their escape, they would have crossed in red the traffic light of Belgrano Avenue and Pueyrredón Street of this capital city, causing a violent accident.
Due to the high speed at which they would have been driving, the two occupants of the motorcycle were fired after being hit by a Renault Kangoo truck.

At first it was announced that one of them had lost his life in the place, but then it was confirmed that they were transferred to the Regional hospital in very serious condition with multiple fractures, bruises and several scoriations.




In the place, worked staff of the Sixth and Criminalistics Police Station.
